entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 at times. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:26 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 at times. High zero. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:26 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Local blowing snow in the evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 at times in the evening. Wind becoming light near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:26 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
